mods.abstract: $50 Reward. Ranaway from the undersigned, about the middle of November last, a negro boy named AARON, about 30 years of age, black, about 5 feet 10 inches high; slender built; tall; narrow forehead; has a down look when spoken to. He is a Hhd- cooper, and pretends that he can make barrels. He was purchased in New Orleans of J. B. Smith, from Charleston. I will give the above reward if delivered on my plantation, on Bayou Jacob, in this parish, or I will pay $25 for his confinement in any jail in this State, so that I can him. JOHN SCHLATRE. feb18
